text: Isoetes taiwanensis is a species of plant in the family Isoetaceae. It is endemic to Taiwan, and the only species of quillwort there. As other quillworts, it is relatively small, with erect leaves long. It grows submersed in shallow ponds for most of the year. IUCN considers it critically endangered because of habitat loss. ==References== taiwanensis Category:Endemic flora of Taiwan Category:Critically endangered plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot Category:Plants described in 1972
title: Isoetes taiwanensis
